recipe.title: Cole Slaw
ingredients: 1/2 medium green cabbage, halved lengthwise and sliced very thin (about 4 cups)
1/2 medium red cabbage, halved lengthwise and sliced very thin (about 4 cups)
instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together dressing ingredients.
Shred apple coarse and add to dressing with cabbage and carrots. Toss cole slaw well.
